tweet_text:
@Carpo34 @GryllidaeC AJ Tye's ball to James Vince was very obviously a deliberate wide bowled with two ideas in mind:
1) deny Vince his ton and
2) deflect some of the attention from the fact that Tye's side had been absolutely thrashed.
Kasperek's was not.

tweet_text:
@WilliamBooger @RepKatiePorter Because with no leverage there's no reason to be concerned with future spending. In the real world, with your finances, you will inevitably do that.
